text: Drag X Drive is a future 2025 sports video game made by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch 2. The game is similar to wheelchair basketball and the game has 3 players on one team and 3 on the other. The game's main feature is using the Joy-Con 2's mouse mode, where players use motion controls like they are using a wheelchair. Drag x Drive was one of the first games shown for the Nintendo Switch 2 during a Nintendo Direct. and is supposed to release in Summer 2025. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Video games about robots Category:Nintendo video games Category:Multiplayer video games Category:Multiplayer online games Category:Basketball video games
